Articles.Content:
I just modded the crap out of my game, and my god the quality is brilliant, spent the entire day finding ones i liked, but it was worth it, Engineer, KAS, Antenna Range, Astronomers Visual Pack, Scansat, Chatterer, orbital science, distant objects, Karbonite, Near future, snacks, new inline cockpit IVA, US, Proc Fairings, snack parts, and a toolbar, SQUEEEEEEE!!!

Now as soon as i have finished i shall start a new career... omg all these parts.... :D:D

Edited January 9, 2015 by vexx32
prafanity removed

I second this.

The modding community takes this game to a whole new level of enjoyment. The possibilities with this game are truly endless.

Don't forget Kerbal Alarm Clock, it's a life saver.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24786-0-90-Kerbal-Alarm-Clock-v3-2-0-0-%28Jan-10%29?highlight=Alarm+Clock

Yes i have that too

How about Transfer Window Planner and Alternate Resource Panel? TriggerAu's mods are really handy.
I love Kopernicus! Making planets with it is so much fun. Rep for the modders!

Another aspect in which this community is awesome is the way information and help is shared in the form of good advice in posts, tutorials, videos etc.

I recently started to learn building spaceplanes. Without this community, I probably would not have achieved Kerbin orbit yet. But with all this great knowledge sharing here, I was already able to build several orbit-capable craft, and actually do a Mun landing and return in a single stage vehicle.

So thanks for the help, everyone!

Yep. The KSP guys are awesome. This forum (and to think about it, this very thread) is a proof of it.

Even the decent SC2 forum seems like a troll-infested pit compared to KSP forums. To date I've only encountered a single troll - and he was mostly harmless and dealt with soon without being fed.

Keep up the good work, KSP community

Agree! Mods are really making this game shine. Many thanks to all the contributers.

PS: I would consider the Precise Nodes mod as mandatory as well. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47863-0-90-0-Precise-Node-1-1-2-Precisely-edit-your-maneuver-nodes

Try Ferram Aerospace Research. It makes aerodynamics so much more realistic (As in, it's-still-not-perfect-but-at-least-nose-cones-do-something-useful-on-your-rockets. I couldn't play without FAR).

Edited January 10, 2015 by Vaporo
Oh im getting memory crashes now... boo. Tried opengl and ATM but still get it. I'll have to wait for the game to be better optimized. These forums are an oasis in a sea of horrid forums.

I was going to say that that's a lot of mods, but apparently I'm a tad late.

Yeah, we do have a whole lot of great people here, don't we?

These forums are an oasis in a sea of horrid forums.

We like to pretend that's all because of us.

Well, we do some of the work. The rest of you are pretty cool, too.

We like to pretend that's all because of us.

Well, we do some of the work. The rest of you are pretty cool, too.

See? Even [cough]most of[/cough] the moderators are awesome!
Tis the best gaming/modding community around from my opinion - so may helpful and smart people
